education: B.S. in Computer Science - State University (Sep 2015 - May 2019): Coursework included data structures, algorithms, software engineering, databases, and web development. Graduated with honors, GPA: 3.8.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform API Development
projects.context: The company needed to modernize its legacy e-commerce platform to support mobile applications and third-party integrations. The existing monolithic architecture was causing performance bottlenecks and limiting scalability.
projects.action: I designed and developed a new RESTful API using Node.js and Express.js, implementing microservices architecture. I worked closely with the frontend team to ensure seamless integration and collaborated with DevOps to set up automated deployment pipelines using GitHub Actions.
projects.achievement: Successfully launched the new API which improved response times by 40% and enabled the mobile app launch. The modular architecture reduced development time for new features by 30%.

projects.title: Database Performance Optimization
projects.context: Customer complaints about slow page load times were increasing, and monitoring revealed database queries as the primary bottleneck during peak traffic periods.
projects.action: I conducted a comprehensive analysis of database queries, implemented proper indexing strategies, and introduced Redis caching for frequently accessed data. I also optimized N+1 query problems and implemented database connection pooling.
projects.achievement: Reduced average page load time by 60% and improved system throughput by 45%. Customer satisfaction scores improved from 3.2 to 4.1 out of 5.

projects.title: Customer Management System
projects.context: The startup needed a custom CRM solution to manage their growing customer base and sales pipeline, as existing solutions were too expensive for their budget.
projects.action: I built a full-stack web application using React for the frontend and Python Flask for the backend, with PostgreSQL as the database. I implemented features like contact management, sales tracking, and automated email notifications.
projects.achievement: The CRM system helped increase sales team productivity by 25% and provided valuable insights that contributed to a 15% increase in conversion rates.

match_goal: Looking for a software engineering role where I can contribute to meaningful projects while continuing to learn new technologies and grow my technical skills. Interested in companies that value collaboration and innovation.
